data.name: Pocket Penguin ( ポケットペンギン) Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the music of Jun Ishikawa, travel back in time, with this amazing soundtrack that will remind you of the Game Boy era.

Pocket Penguin has an amazing sountrack that comes directly from the Game Boy Console.
